Material Drifter

About Bits + Bops Fibers Film Prints Reflections Zines Contact

looking for

you can catch it
in the reflections of a day
cast through windows, or
the mourning dove cooing you awake

you can catch it
in cups, overflowing
transmuting
that which keeps us warm

you can catch it
in retinal illuminations received as a dream
in small moments, witnessed

you can catch it
in moonbeams and mirrors
reflecting back to you
a body of light
